# daysOfTheWeek

**Instance Property**

The days of the week associated with the recurrence rule, as an array of [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKRecurrenceDayOfWeek] objects.

## Declaration

```swift
var daysOfTheWeek: [EKRecurrenceDayOfWeek]? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property value is valid only for recurrence rules that were initialized with specific days of the week and a frequency type of [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKRecurrenceFrequency/weekly], [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKRecurrenceFrequency/monthly], or [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKRecurrenceFrequency/yearly].

## Accessing Recurrence Rule Properties

- **EKRecurrenceFrequency**: The frequency for recurrence rules.
- **calendarIdentifier**: The identifier for the recurrence rule’s calendar.
- **recurrenceEnd**: Indicates when the recurrence rule ends.
- **frequency**: The frequency of the recurrence rule.
- **interval**: Specifies how often the recurrence rule repeats over the unit of time indicated by its frequency.
- **firstDayOfTheWeek**: Indicates which day of the week the recurrence rule treats as the first day of the week.
- **daysOfTheMonth**: The days of the month associated with the recurrence rule, as an array of `NSNumber` objects.
- **daysOfTheYear**: The days of the year associated with the recurrence rule, as an array of `NSNumber` objects.
- **weeksOfTheYear**: The weeks of the year associated with the recurrence rule, as an array of `NSNumber` objects.
- **monthsOfTheYear**: The months of the year associated with the recurrence rule, as an array of `NSNumber` objects.
- **setPositions**: An array of ordinal numbers that filters which recurrences to include in the recurrence rule’s frequency.
- **EK_LOSE_FRACTIONAL_SECONDS_DO_NOT_USE()**: A deprecated function.
